I have found, actually, that the H3 MirrorWriterProcessor writes to $HERITR=
IX_HOME/mirror/, rather than to $HERITRIX_HOME/jobs/your_job_name/mirror/, =
as I too would expect.  Seems like a bug to me.  

I work around this probl=
em using the following property setting under the MirrorWriterProcessor bea=
n:

<property name=3D"path" value=3D"jobs/your_job_name/mirror"/>

That mea=
ns I have to customize it for every job, but it's not that much hassle.

St=
eve
